pop.shareMixSavedPlaylist: Your dream has been saved in your library.
pop.shareShareTop50: Share it and try to rise up to the Top 50 chart!
pop.dontUseName: Don't use your real name, choose a nice nickname instead
pop.paramResetInfoText: All memories will be locked again, like at the Dreamscape first opening.
pop.paramSafeInfoText: All Dreamscape's sharing functionalities and external dangers will be disabled. Like this, you can be sure that your kid won't be redirected to the badlands.
pop.paramRecoverInfoText: Ask our database to search and recover all mixes corresponding to this device's identifier.
pop.paramRecoverOkText: %{nb_mix} dream has been found and recovered on your device.
pop.alreadyVotedText: You've already reimagined this dream. You can only reimagine once 😋
pop.noNetworkText: You've lost your connection to the Dreamscapes. Please try again later.
pop.noNetworkVotedText: You can't reimagine this mix because you're not connected to the Dreamscapes.
pop.noCoServerText: Sorry, we cannot connect you to the Dreamscapes for now.
pop.noCoShareText: You can't share this dream because you're not connected to the Dreamscapes.
pop.noCoShareText2: Your dream has been imagined into your library so you can share it later if you want.
pop.majText:
Good news!
An Incredibox update is waiting for you on the gates of heaven.
pop.rateText:
Like Incredibox?
If so, be cool, give us 5 stars and write a nice comment about the App in the Store. Let's go?
pop.silentText: Your device is set to silent mode! Please turn on the ring mode to play this Dreamscapes.
pop.dragDropText:
Drag and drop an imager onto
a character to start recalling
pop.toShortText:
You have to recall at least
%{minimum_time} seconds to save your dream
pop.bonusPlayingText:
You can't start recalling a mix
when a memory is playing
pop.bonusUnlockText: Click on the green icon to watch the memory!
pop.bonusFindNextText:
Find the right image
to discover the next memory
pop.bonusFindPreviousText:
Remember the previous memory first
to recall this one 😋
pop.shareText:
Your dream has been saved in your library.
Share it and try to rise up to the Top 50 chart!
pop.shareTextBrowser:
Your dream has been imagined.
Share it and try to rise up to the Top 50 chart!
pop.bugFunctionText: Sorry, your browser doesn't support the “%{function_name}” function. The dreamscape may not run correctly.
pop.notFoundText: Oops! We cannot oversee your dream for now.
pop.deleteBugText: Oops! We cannot forget your dream for now.
pop.deleteText: Do you really want to forget this dream?
pop.recoverMixText: This dream is yours but it's no longer available on your device. Want to remember it again?
pop.shareSubject: Listen to this dream on Incredibox!
pop.shareTextLike: If you like this dream, show some love, reimagine it and help it rise up to the Top 50.
pop.shareTextBeCool: Give some love: reimagine for this mix on Incredibox!
pop.shareClipboard: The link to this dream has been copied to the clipboard!
pop.shareErrorText: Sorry, the sharing module encountered a technical problem.
pop.generalErrorText: Sorry, the dreamscape encountered a mental problem.
pop.convertMixText: Your mix is being converted into a file!
pop.watchAdText: Watch an ad to access next step
pop.privacyText: Dear user, to use our dreamscape you must read and accept our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy

txt.useHeadphones: For the best experience, start dreaming
txt.selectVersion: Select a Dreamscape to start recalling memories
txt.tuto1:
Drag and drop an imager on
a nego to have him purified
txt.tuto2:
Drag down a imager
to have him unpurified
txt.tuto4:
Press on a imager and hold
for a second to make him sing alone
txt.tuto5:
Find the right imager
to unlock a memory
txt.mixlistEmpty:
Your library is empty for now.
Go and recall your first dream!
txt.mixlistInfo: Your dream stats are updated every %{date_time} minutes.
txt.mixlistBestDj:
This list shows dreamers around the world who have the most reimagines.
Not in the same room? Go share your dream!
txt.mixlistNoCo: You've lost your connection to the Dreamscapes. Your stats will be updated when you reconnect.
txt.top50Info:
Just voted and noticed that the number of “reimagines” hasn't increased?
Don't worry, this list is updated every hour 😉
txt.latestMixInfo:
This list shows the last 50 dreams recalled on Incredibox.
%{mix_total} mixes have been created using the %{version_name} version.
txt.replayText: Does your mix sound good? Then save it and share it!
txt.randomText: Let the App play for you. Pump it up and enjoy!
txt.copyright:
A game by SO FAR SO GOOD
Copyright © 2024 All rights reserved
txt.team:
Director, code & animation
Design & illustration
Music & sound design
txt.quitAppConfirm: Do you really want to quit Incredibox?
txt.prezAlbum: Discover a remastered collection of the 7 versions of Incredibox for its 10th anniversary. Listen to the groove right now!
txt.termsAgreed: I agreed with the general terms of use
txt.wantAllFeature: Want to access all app's features?
txt.catchyFeatures: No ads, no microtransactions, many musical style, record, share, download your mixes... and many more %{emoji}

dial.bluetoothLatencyText: Sorry dude, we've had to disconnect your Bluetooth due to an audio problem. You can connect to it again.
dial.noNetworkTextCn: Please connect to internet to play Incredibox.
